channel.title: Help rep++ easy fix! but im new at coding
channel.description:
[code]Loaded WorldMap In (101 ms)... Demise PK'ing has been activated... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "7 8 Staff Shop" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:80) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:33) at server.main(server.java:136)
[/code]
ive added a shop i got that error

item.title: Help rep++ easy fix! but im new at coding
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

Are you guys fucking retarded?

Staff shop == Staff_Shop.

EDIT:

I Vain I:

ITT: Obvious idiots. Please put an underscore between “Staff” and “Shop” and remove the space.

Didn’t see sorry lol.

Read full topic
item.source: Help rep++ easy fix! but im new at coding

item.title: Help rep++ easy fix! but im new at coding
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

[quote=“lord_fear, post:9, topic:376897”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=472811.msg3458008#msg3458008 date=1294200095]

if its to easy, then why cant you do it?

OT
It has to do with you editing the .cfg file, read up on them here:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,461237.0.html

But in the mean time, i can tell you that its probably not tabbed correctly just by looking at that error.

thats didn’t really help

We don’t spoon feed, BUT
What everyone is trying to say is, When you are editing the CFG files
Use your TAB button (Left of Q if using a QWERTY Keyboard) Instead of the Spacebar.

you can’t exactly not spoon feed a compiler error. LOL.
Definitely when it says “shops” and most, if not all shop errors are something to do with the cfg file.
[/quote]
You can spoon feed anyone with anything.

get notepad++

That’s software, Not going to help much…[/quote]

actually i shows where the errors are so if you look it says in 80 it will show you the line of error in notpad++ so gtfo nerd.

Read full topic
item.source: Help rep++ easy fix! but im new at coding

item.title: Help rep++ easy fix! but im new at coding
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

offtopic much
you cant rep.
ontopic

TABS!like everyone has said,just edit the file,and put a ‘tab’ between each line.

Read full topic

item.title: Help rep++ easy fix! but im new at coding
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

You didn’t tab the shop.cfg file correctly. Copying tabs of of MoparScape doesn’t work, so go back and re-tab it. It should fix your problem.

Read full topic
